title: Council Decision of 15 November 2004 replacing members and alternate members of the Administrative Board of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work
header:
29.1.2005 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 24/2
COUNCIL DECISION
of 15 November 2004
replacing members and alternate members of the Administrative Board of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work
(2005/C 24/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 2062/94 of 18 July 1994 establishing a European Agency for Safety and Health at Work (1), and in particular Article 8 thereof,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decisions of 3 June 2002 (2) and 29 April 2004 (3), the Council appointed members and alternate members of the Administrative Board of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work for the period ending on 2 June 2005.
(2) Two members' seats and one alternate member's seat on that Administrative Board in the government representatives category have fallen vacant following the resignations of Mr Leodegario FERNÁNDEZ SÁNCHEZ, Mr Tom BEEGAN and Ms Sylvia WOOD.
(3) The representatives of employees' and employers' organisations have submitted a list of nominations for the members' and alternate members' seats which have become vacant following the resignation of certain members,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed as members and alternate members of the Administrative Board of the European Agency for Safety and Health at Work for the period ending on 2 June 2005:
I.   GOVERNMENT REPRESENTATIVES
Country Member Name To replace:
Spain Member Mr Javier PINILLA GARCÍA Mr Leodegario FERNÁNDEZ SÁNCHEZ
Ireland Member Mr Daniel KELLY Mr Tom BEEGAN
Alternate Mr Pat DONNELLAN Ms Sylvia WOOD
II.   REPRESENTATIVES OF EMPLOYEES' ORGANISATIONS
Country Member Name To replace:
Belgium Member Mr Hermann FONCK Mr François PHILIPS
Alternate Mr François PHILIPS Mr Hermann FONCK
Denmark Member Mr Jan Kahr FREDERIKSEN Mr Lone JACOBSEN
Alternate Mr Lone JACOBSEN Mr Jan Kahr FREDERIKSEN
Estonia Member Mr Argo SOON Mr Ülo KRISTJUHAN
Alternate Mr Peeter ROSS Mr Argo SOON
Greece Alternate Mr Ioannis KONSTANTINIDIS Mr Spiros DRIVAS
Spain Alternate Mr Jesus GARCIA Mr Angel Carlos CARCOBA ALONSO
France Member Mr Giles SEITZ Mr Jean-Claude BODARD
Italy Member Ms Gabriella GALLI Ms Luisa BENEDETTINI
Alternate Ms Paola AGNELLO MODICA Ms Gabriella GALLI
Luxembourg Member Mr Antoine GIARDIN Mr Marcel GOEREND
Alternate Mr Marcel GOEREND Mr Antoine GIARDIN
Slovakia Member Mr Peter RAMPASEK Mr Ján KOŠOVSKÝ
Alternate Mr Jaroslav BOBELA Mr Peter RAMPÁŠEK
Finland Alternate Ms Riitta TYÖLÄJÄRVI Ms Irma PAHLMAN
III.   REPRESENTATIVES OF EMPLOYERS' ORGANISATIONS
Country Member Name To replace:
Germany Member Mr Thomas HOLTMANN Mr Reiner LEHR
Alternate Mr Herbert BENDER Mr Thomas HOLTMANN
Estonia Alternate Ms Kristiina KIBE Ms Iren VÕITRA
Spain Member Ms Pilar IGLESIAS VALCARCE Mr Pere TEIXIDO CAMPAS
Alternate Mr Pere TEIXIDO CAMPAS
Lithuania Alternate Mr Jonas GUZAVICIUS Mr Vytautas TRECIOKAS
Portugal Member Mr Marcelino PENA COSTA Mr Costa TAVARES
Alternate Mr José COSTA TAVARES Mr José Luis SALGADO BARROSO
Sweden Alternate Mr Bodil MELLBLOM Ms Ulla-Britt FRÄJDIN-HELLQVIST
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 November 2004.
For the Council
The President
M. van der HOEVEN
(1)  OJ L 216, 20.8.1994, p. 1. Regulation as amended by Regulation (EC) No 1643/95 (OJ L 156, 7.7.1995, p. 1).
(2)  OJ C 161, 5.7.2002, p. 5.
(3)  OJ C 116, 30.4.2004, p. 16.
